about_the_game:
The Prison
Welcome to The Prison, a modern reimagining that pays homage to the classic late 90's game. Dive into an immersive multiplayer experience that captures the essence of the original while introducing enhanced graphics, engaging gameplay, and new features for today's gamers.

Game Features:

  • Stunning Graphics: Step into a vividly detailed prison world that feels incredibly lifelike, bringing every corner of the facility to life.
  • Expanded Gameplay: Engage in strategic planning and intense action as you navigate through the prison, interact with other players, and complete missions.
  • Multiplayer: Join forces with friends or compete against others in real-time multiplayer modes. Form alliances, trade resources, and battle for supremacy.
  • Customizable Characters: Create and customize your inmate with a wide range of options, from appearance to skills and abilities.
  • Rich Storyline: Follow a gripping narrative that evolves with your decisions. Every choice you make will impact the outcome of your journey.
  • New Features: Discover new items, challenges, and secrets as you explore the depths of The Prison.

Are you ready to escape or will you rule from the inside? The choice is yours in The Prison.

content_descriptors.notes: The Prison contains mature content, including instances of extreme violence, strong language, and suggestive themes. Players should be aware that the game also involves topics such as non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, and self-harm. These elements are integral to the game's narrative and setting, and are designed to create a realistic and immersive experience. Player discretion is advised.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Rocky Linux 8 / Redhat Linux 8 or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2080
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2080
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: glibc 2.28 or newer
